entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
